content.body:
I’d like to champion my first (small) proposal (as a delegate from Indiana University) and get it added to the August meeting’s agenda. I’ve never done this before—do I just open a pull request to tc39/agendas?
(The proposal is at https://github.com/js-choi/proposal-array-async-from and https://jschoi.org/21/es-array-async-from/. No slides yet.)

content.body: jschoi: you should maybe ask in the TC39 Delegates room.
